messages: Just me. American idol. Nail polish and Twitter tonight.
Just me. American idol. Nail polish and Twitter tonight.
Call your girlfriend. By Robyn. Yeah all I see is her singing it to him. Breaks my heart.😔
And I wonder if I ever cross your mind because for me it happens all the time.
